div.style: width: 130px; float: left; padding-left:18px; position:relative; padding-top: 3px;

p.b: Per Governor Gavin Newsom's Executive Order N-29-20 and the March 16, 2020 Order of the Health Officer of San Mateo County Directing All Individuals Living in the County are required to Shelter at Their Place of Residence. The Millbrae School District, in an effort to mitigate cross contamination, protect our community, employees, and facilities will also close its fields, basketball courts, and playground areas to the public.

a.title: Click to read more about: Campuses Closed

div.a: School Closure Extension | MESD's Distance Learning Phase II

span.p: I hope this email finds you well. Please join me in giving a shout out to our staff and to you parents for a successful transition to our Phase I of MESD's Remote/Distance Learning Plan.

a.title: Click to read more about: School Closure Extension | MESD's Distance Learning Phase II

div.a: March 25, 2020 COVID-19 Updates | School Closure Extended to May 1, 2020

p.b: Hello again, it’s time for another update on our continually evolving situation. Thank you for staying tuned.

a.title: Click to read more about: March 25, 2020 COVID-19 Updates | School Closure Extended to May 1, 2020
Click to read more about: March 23, 2020 COVID-19 Updates | Superintendent Message

div.a: School Closure, Remote/Distance Learning, Meals Served

p.b: Please join me in giving a Shout Out to our district office teammates, site administration, teachers and support staff who have buckled down these last few days and nights to prepare and provide a remote/distance learning plan for our students, meal service preparations and essential cleaning of our campuses.

a.title: Click to read more about: School Closure, Remote/Distance Learning, Meals Served

div.a: MSD Continuing to Serve Breakfast and Lunch

meta.b: The Millbrae Elementary School District Child Nutrition Services is providing an opportunity for families to drive through and pick up meals for the children in their families
meta.strong: We are now required to follow social distancing procedures so adults must get out of their cars and help themselves to bags and milk on carts/tables.

a.title: Click to read more about: MSD Continuing to Serve Breakfast and Lunch

div.a: School Closure | Transition to Remote Learning

p.b: I want to thank you for your support during this unprecedented time and share that we

a.title: Click to read more about: School Closure | Transition to Remote Learning

div.a: Superintendent Search | March 5, 2020: Community Open Forum Input Session 6:30PM to 7:30PM @ Spring Valley School (MUR)

p.b: The Board of Trustees of the Millbrae School District is in the process of conducting a Superintendent Search for purposes of hiring the District's next Superintendent. The executive search firm, Leadership Associates, was selected to advise the Board in this important process.

a.title: Click to read more about: Superintendent Search | March 5, 2020: Community Open Forum Input Session 6:30PM to 7:30PM @ Spring Valley School (MUR)
